cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.trajectory: moving quickly WNW across the eastern Caribbean Sea, forecast to skirt southern Hispaniola Saturday, Jamaica Sunday, then approach Cuba and eventually the eastern Gulf of Mexico / Florida peninsula early next week
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern Hispaniola or eastern Cuba (first major land interaction)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane and Tropical-Storm Watches/Warnings confined to the Windward Islands, southern Hispaniola, Haiti, Jamaica and parts of the eastern Caribbean
weather_observation.warning_coast: Same areas – Barbados, St. Lucia, St. Vincent & the Grenadines under Hurricane Warning; Martinique, Dominican Republic south coast and Haiti under Tropical-Storm Warning
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Windward Islands, Leeward Islands, southern Hispaniola, Jamaica, eastern Cuba, Florida Peninsula/Gulf coast within 5-day cone – NOT the Mid-Atlantic or Northeast coast
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: CHARLOTTE NC (closest listed point in wind-probability table)
weather_observation.first_hazard: None expected at port during forecast window
weather_observation.wind: None – probability of tropical-storm-force winds remains below 5% through 5 days
